text: The 1987 African Women's Handball Championship was the seventh edition of the African Women's Handball Championship, held in Morocco. It acted as the African qualifying tournament for the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 1988 Summer Olympics |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |- |align=center|7|| |- |align=center|8|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 1987 Women African Women's Handball Championship African Women's Handball Championship Category:1987 in Moroccan sport Category:1987 in African handball Category:Women's handball in Morocco
title: 1987 African Women's Handball Championship
